card.name: Camthalion
card.text: Unique. Elf. Dark Elf. 1 strike. +2 prowess against Elves.May be played keyed to any Dark-domain [d] or Dark-hold [D], if there is a Nazgûl permanent-event or Ringwraith in play, or to any Shadow-hold [S] following a Nazgûl attack. Cannot be targetted by spells or magic. As a short-event, playable on a hero character moving through a Dark-domain or to/from a Dark-hold. Character loses all his skills for the rest of the turn; discard any Knowledge or Information events he controls.

card.name: Ellindiel
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Grey Agent. +2 EI against characters with a home site in Eriador. Discard if in company with an Elf or Dúnadan with a higher mind.Any Wisp of Pale Sheen may be played keyed to Ellindiel's current non-Free-hold [F] site.

card.name: Elves of Edhellond
card.text: Unique. Playable at Edhellond if the influence check is greater than 10.Standard Modifications: Elves (+2), Dúnedain (+1), character with home site Edhellond (+2). This faction is worth 2 mp if no manifestation of Eärcaraxë is in active play. If Círdor is at Edhellond, you may play Sail to the West as if at Grey Havens.

card.name: Kheleglin
card.text: Unique. Elf. Noldo. Elf-lord specific. Playable at any Dark-hold [D], if you discard (for no effect) a Stolen Knowledge card from the company. Kheleglin comes into play wounded. tap: if at an Elf-hold and discard a (stored) Reforging from his company to search your discard pile or sideboard.for a Noldo Lantern, which may be placed with a character in the company.

card.name: Maranya
card.text: Unique. Mind Ring. Playable on Celedhring at Barad-dûr(or in your starting company in lieu of a minor item). You may play Mithril and Vein of Arda as minion resources. Celedhring only: during site phase at a Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D] you may:tap: store and/or play Dark Forges as if at a Darkhaven [K].tap: place a Vein of Arda or Mithril in the company with an item in the company: it becomes a jewel and all of its bonusses are increased by 1.Celedhring makes a corruption check at -2.
